parameters.name: ApplicationSourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the application source. Valid values:

*   urn:alibaba:idaas:app:source:template: application template
*   urn:alibaba:idaas:app:source:standard: standard protocol

parameters.name: ApplicationTemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the application template. This parameter is required if you set the ApplicationSourceType parameter to urn:alibaba:idaas:app:source:template.

parameters.name: LogoUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the application logo.

parameters.name: SsoType
parameters.description:
The SSO protocol. Valid values:

*   saml2: the SAML 2.0 protocol.
*   oidc: the OpenID Connect protocol.
